Categories of Fixes
- Stability & Performance: Crash fixes, memory usage optimization, and reduced latency.
- General Bug Fixes: Virtual keyboard, windshield effects, camera bugs, and more.
- Aircraft Enhancements: New liveries, texture improvements, and system fixes.
- Career Mode & Missions: Refinements in mission logic, scoring, and aircraft wear-and-tear tracking.
- Scenery & World Enhancements: Improved LODs, fixed visual artifacts, and better vegetation.
